entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain or rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
